Header: Video :70% candidates  passed the year-5 scholarship examination this year
Content: Education Minister Bandula Gunawardana says that 70 percent candidates have passed the year-5 scholarship examination this year. Addressing a media briefing held at his Ministry today the Minister said that 223 thousand 908 out of a total of 322 thousand 455 candidates passed the examination. He also said that this yearâ€™s ceiling for the student scholarship allowance is 160 marks.
